title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Local Hire Vacancies
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us     Local Hire Vacancies              Jobs: Local Hire Authority Openings              Every current local-hire authority job opening will be posted here. Most summer jobs are posted in mid-late winter, though jobs do open other times of the year. Read these announcements carefully to determine eligibility. Who may apply:  Any U.S. citizen who has acquired special knowledge or expertise regarding the natural or cultural resources of Glacier Bay National Park and Preserve, by reason of having either lived or worked in or near the park. This level of knowledge would be acquired by having lived or worked in or near the park for at least 12 months, to include all four seasons. The areas considered to be "local" to Glacier Bay National Park and Preserve include Gustavus, Hoonah, Elfin Cove, Pelican, Excursion Inlet, Haines, Skagway, Juneau-Douglas-Auke Bay, Yakutat, and Dry Bay.      The links below, in the "Title, Grade" column, provide specific information for each current job announcement.    Ann # Title, Series, Grade Open Date Range Salary     No current vacancies
